name: @asyml8/api-types
description: Shared TypeScript types for all ASYML8 APIs

scripts.generate: npm run generate:contracts && npm run generate:services && npm run generate:slices && npm run generate:index && npm run format-lint && npm run build
scripts.generate:dev: npm run generate:contracts -- dev && npm run generate:services && npm run generate:slices && npm run generate:index && npm run format-lint && npm run build
scripts.generate:qa: npm run generate:contracts -- qa && npm run generate:services && npm run generate:slices && npm run generate:index && npm run format-lint && npm run build
scripts.generate:prod: npm run generate:contracts -- prod && npm run generate:services && npm run generate:slices && npm run generate:index && npm run format-lint && npm run build
